response_content:
To create a UML class diagram for a simple customer management application, we need to identify the primary classes and their relationships. In a basic customer management system, you might have the following classes:

1. **Customer**: Represents a customer with attributes like name, email, phone number, and address.
2. **Order**: Represents an order placed by a customer, with attributes like order ID, date, and total amount.
3. **Product**: Represents a product that can be ordered, with attributes like product ID, name, and price.
4. **OrderItem**: Represents an item in an order, linking a product to an order with a quantity.
5. **Address**: Represents a customer's address, which can be used for billing or shipping.

Now, let's define these classes with their attributes and relationships:

- **Customer**
  - Attributes:
    - customerId: String
    - name: String
    - email: String
    - phoneNumber: String
  - Relationships:
    - Has one or more addresses (1 to many)
    - Can place one or more orders (1 to many)

- **Order**
  - Attributes:
    - orderId: String
    - orderDate: Date
    - totalAmount: Double
  - Relationships:
    - Belongs to one customer (many to 1)
    - Contains one or more order items (1 to many)

- **Product**
  - Attributes:
    - productId: String
    - name: String
    - price: Double
  - Relationships:
    - Can be part of many order items (1 to many)

- **OrderItem**
  - Attributes:
    - quantity: Integer
  - Relationships:
    - Links one product to one order (many to 1 for both)

- **Address**
  - Attributes:
    - addressId: String
    - street: String
    - city: String
    - state: String
    - zipCode: String
  - Relationships:
    - Belongs to one customer (many to 1)

Now, let's create a draw.io text file representation for this UML class diagram:

```xml
<mxfile host="app.diagrams.net">
  <diagram name="Customer Management UML" id="customer_management_uml">
    <mxGraphModel dx="1000" dy="1000" grid="1" gridSize="10" guides="1" tooltips="1" connect="1" arrows="1" fold="1" page="1" pageScale="1" pageWidth="827" pageHeight="1169" math="0" shadow="0">
      <root>
        <mxCell id="0" />
        <mxCell id="1" parent="0" />
        
        <!-- Customer Class -->
        <mxCell id="2" value="Customer" style="shape=rectangle;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="1">
          <mxGeometry x="100" y="100" width="120" height="140" as="geometry" />
        </mxCell>
        <mxCell id="3" value="customerId: String" style="text;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="2">
          <mxGeometry y="20" width="120" height="20" as="geometry" />
        </mxCell>
        <mxCell id="4" value="name: String" style="text;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="2">
          <mxGeometry y="40" width="120" height="20" as="geometry" />
        </mxCell>
        <mxCell id="5" value="email: String" style="text;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="2">
          <mxGeometry y="60" width="120" height="20" as="geometry" />
        </mxCell>
        <mxCell id="6" value="phoneNumber: String" style="text;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="2">
          <mxGeometry y="80" width="120" height="20" as="geometry" />
        </mxCell>

        <!-- Order Class -->
        <mxCell id="7" value="Order" style="shape=rectangle;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="1">
          <mxGeometry x="300" y="100" width="120" height="100" as="geometry" />
        </mxCell>
        <mxCell id="8" value="orderId: String" style="text;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="7">
          <mxGeometry y="20" width="120" height="20" as="geometry" />
        </mxCell>
        <mxCell id="9" value="orderDate: Date" style="text;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="7">
          <mxGeometry y="40" width="120" height="20" as="geometry" />
        </mxCell>
        <mxCell id="10" value="totalAmount: Double" style="text;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="7">
          <mxGeometry y="60" width="120" height="20" as="geometry" />
        </mxCell>

        <!-- Product Class -->
        <mxCell id="11" value="Product" style="shape=rectangle;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="1">
          <mxGeometry x="500" y="100" width="120" height="80" as="geometry" />
        </mxCell>
        <mxCell id="12" value="productId: String" style="text;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="11">
          <mxGeometry y="20" width="120" height="20" as="geometry" />
        </mxCell>
        <mxCell id="13" value="name: String" style="text;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="11">
          <mxGeometry y="40" width="120" height="20" as="geometry" />
        </mxCell>
        <mxCell id="14" value="price: Double" style="text;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="11">
          <mxGeometry y="60" width="120" height="20" as="geometry" />
        </mxCell>

        <!-- OrderItem Class -->
        <mxCell id="15" value="OrderItem" style="shape=rectangle;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="1">
          <mxGeometry x="300" y="300" width="120" height="60" as="geometry" />
        </mxCell>
        <mxCell id="16" value="quantity: Integer" style="text;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="15">
          <mxGeometry y="20" width="120" height="20" as="geometry" />
        </mxCell>

        <!-- Address Class -->
        <mxCell id="17" value="Address" style="shape=rectangle;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="1">
          <mxGeometry x="100" y="300" width="120" height="120" as="geometry" />
        </mxCell>
        <mxCell id="18" value="addressId: String" style="text;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="17">
          <mxGeometry y="20" width="120" height="20" as="geometry" />
        </mxCell>
        <mxCell id="19" value="street: String" style="text;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="17">
          <mxGeometry y="40" width="120" height="20" as="geometry" />
        </mxCell>
        <mxCell id="20" value="city: String" style="text;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="17">
          <mxGeometry y="60" width="120" height="20" as="geometry" />
        </mxCell>
        <mxCell id="21" value="state: String" style="text;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="17">
          <mxGeometry y="80" width="120" height="20" as="geometry" />
        </mxCell>
        <mxCell id="22" value="zipCode: String" style="text;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="17">
          <mxGeometry y="100" width="120" height="20" as="geometry" />
        </mxCell>

        <!-- Relationships -->
        <mxCell id="23" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;exitX=0.5;exitY=1;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;entryX=0.5;entryY=0;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;" edge="1" parent="1" source="2" target="17">
          <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" />
        </mxCell>
        <mxCell id="24" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;exitX=0.5;exitY=1;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;entryX=0.5;entryY=0;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;" edge="1" parent="1" source="2" target="7">
          <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" />
        </mxCell>
        <mxCell id="25" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;exitX=0.5;exitY=1;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;entryX=0.5;entryY=0;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;" edge="1" parent="1" source="7" target="15">
          <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" />
        </mxCell>
        <mxCell id="26" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;exitX=0.5;exitY=1;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;entryX=0.5;entryY=0;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;" edge="1" parent="1" source="15" target="11">
          <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" />
        </mxCell>
      </root>
    </mxGraphModel>
  </diagram>
</mxfile>
```

This XML code represents a draw.io diagram with the classes and relationships as described. You can copy this code into a draw.io file to visualize the UML class diagram.
